channel.title: Inspired IT - Moments
channel.description: Quick thoughts, observations, and links from Jeroen Gordijn

item.title: February 8, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Been experimenting with adding a microblog to the site. The idea is simple: quick notes and observations that don’t need the full treatment of a blog post. Sometimes you just want to jot down a thought.

Found an interesting article on static site generation patterns — the approach of pre-rendering everything at build time keeps things beautifully simple.

item.title: February 6, 2025
item.content:encoded: Kotlin’s scope functions (let, run, apply, also, with) are one of those features that seem trivial at first but completely change how you structure code. Once you get fluent with them, going back to Java feels like writing with oven mitts on.
